# couchbase-capella_app_endpoint_cors (Resource)

Manages CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) configuration for App Endpoints in Couchbase Capella.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_endpoint_name` (String) The name of the App Endpoint.
- `app_service_id` (String) The ID of the Capella App Service.
- `cluster_id` (String) The ID of the Capella cluster.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the Capella organization.
- `origin` (Set of String) Set of allowed origins for CORS. Use ['*'] to allow access from everywhere.
- `project_id` (String) The ID of the Capella project.

### Optional

- `disabled` (Boolean) Indicates whether CORS is disabled.
- `headers` (Set of String) Set of allowed headers for CORS.
- `login_origin` (Set of String) Set of allowed login origins for CORS.
- `max_age` (Number) Specifies the duration (in seconds) for which the results of a preflight request can be cached.
